extends Object
    Converts an LGraph to an EPGM Graph

      LogicalGraph buildSimplifiedGraph(LogicalGraph input, LGraph layouted)
      Build a new EPGM-Graph from the given LGraph, by converting LVertices to vertices 1:1.
      protected static String getSubelementListValue(List<GradoopId> ids)
      Helper function to convert the List of sub-elements into a comma seperated string Gradoop (especially the CSVDataSink) seems to have trouble with lists of PropertyValues, so this is the easies workaround

      • buildSimplifiedGraph

        public LogicalGraph buildSimplifiedGraph(LogicalGraph input,
                                         LGraph layouted)
        Build a new EPGM-Graph from the given LGraph, by converting LVertices to vertices 1:1.
        Parameters:
        input - The original EPGMGraph, to use it's factory
        layouted - The LGraph to convert
        Returns:
        The converted LGraph

      • getSubelementListValue

        protected static String getSubelementListValue(List<GradoopId> ids)
        Helper function to convert the List of sub-elements into a comma seperated string Gradoop (especially the CSVDataSink) seems to have trouble with lists of PropertyValues, so this is the easies workaround
        Parameters:
        ids - List of GradoopIds
        Returns:
        A comma seperated string of ids
